channel.title: [Question]Hamachi[Its use]
channel.description: [center]::Questions::[/center] [center]ok i just want to know how does hamachi work? Do i have to edit in my files and put my ip or something of the sort or do i simply give people my ip and they will connect to me and then hamachi will come into work? And if i have to give my ip do i give my global or local ip.[/center]

item.title: [Question]Hamachi[Its use]
item.dc:creator: @jut_is_back jut_is_back
item.description:
@jut_is_back wrote:

okay u start off hamachi u copy and paste any hamachi adress and pass into the place where the thing looks like a ninja thing from naruto or that other one then right click it and it should say join net work thats where u copied and paste things first the network address Example Jutscape [HAM EDITON] server 1

pass 123 and u should log in that net work u dont need to log in everyday u can just leave the net work alone
